scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, crowned with thorns and bleeding, carrying a large wooden cross. He is surrounded by a group of soldiers in armor, some of whom are pushing and pulling at him. To the left, three women, identified as the Virgin Mary and two other mourners, watch with sorrowful expressions. In the background, a fortified castle with towers and battlements is visible, suggesting a city setting. The overall atmosphere is one of suffering and solemnity, portraying the arduous journey to the crucifixion.
